EA1FA50DE12A42B282495D8391A77827.description: Language Acquisition Criterion D - Using language in spoken and written form: Organizes thoughts, feelings, ideas, opinions and information in spoken and written form and develops accuracy when speaking and writing in the target language

1BF43AE48AAD4721AB3E0736CAF203A3.description: Language Acquisition Criterion C - Communicating in response to spoken, written and/or visual text: Interacts and communicates in various situations, expresses thoughts, feelings, ideas, opinions and information in spoken and written form, and speaks and writes for specific purposes

E41F8EBEB75A457296D54164E4C3D482.description: Language Acquisition Criterion B - Comprehending written and visual text: Reads for specific purposes and respond to show understanding, interprets visual text that is presented with written text, engages with the text by supporting opinion and personal response with evidence and examples from the text

11A96C9029224F7EBEAE5779400ECADC.description: Language Acquisition Criterion A - Comprehending spoken and visual text: Listens for specific purposes and respond to show understanding, interprets visual text that is presented with spoken text, engages with the text by supporting opinion and personal response with evidence and examples from the text
